lines.text: I wonder what future he'll have.
Takayama! What about your boy? Don't you want him back too? We still have his cells... We could do it now!
I couldn't be so cruel. I couldn't bring Yoichi back into this world.
Ando... It will be many, many, many years before I can sleep easy.
There is not a man in the world who would wish his own son dead.
Dr Ando, Dr Takayama didn't want Yoichi to die. He wanted to save him... for Reiko.
You couldn't slit your wrists but you happily tore apart me!
